2025-05-15.title: Occidental Petroleum, ExxonMobil, Chevron Fall In Pre-Market As Oil Prices Plunge Amid Trump's US-Iran Nuclear Deal Comments

2025-05-15.title: Guyana Soldiers Attacked by Venezuela Amid Oil Territory Dispute
2025-05-15.description: In a significant escalation of the longstanding territorial dispute over the oil-rich Essequibo region made famous by a string of ExxonMobil discoveries, the Guyana Defence Force (GDF) said on Thursday that its troops were attacked by armed individuals in civ…

2025-05-08.title: Marubeni to Invest in ExxonMobil Ammonia Project in Texas
2025-05-08.description: The Japanese diversified company also agreed to buy about 250,000 metric tons a year of ammonia from the planned project.

2025-05-12.title: Boulder’s landmark climate lawsuit against Suncor and Exxon can continue, Colorado Supreme Court rules
2025-05-12.description: Boulder and Boulder County filed the lawsuit seven years ago, seeking to hold Suncor Energy and ExxonMobil accountable for driving climate change and the damages their pollution has caused.
